column2: an A.M. Eatery////It also took awhile for our food to come out
column3: but the food tasted great. The girlfriend and I shared the Breakfast Pot Pie
column5: and Chili Verde Benny. Everything came out hot and fresh. My favorite out of the three was definitely the Chili Verde Benny
column6: which I highly recommend to anyone looking for a unique benedict experience. The poached eggs on the Ham Benedict III were cooked perfectly with the egg yolks oozing out and the Breakfast Pot Pie was warm and comforting.
